channel.title: Help plx? coders plz help
channel.description:
So i got an "Insane" server,client...but i need WHIP SPEC Il Send you the client.java and heres the tut. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,125122.0.html
IF YOU HELP U BE ADMIN AT MY SERVER WITH MAX STATS ALL RARES AND ANY OTHER THINGS YOU WANT PLEASE HELP!
I BEG YOU ELITE CODERS OR WHATEVER..HELP! :(
I had these errors lmao...
[code]client.java:5845: illegal start of type }*/ ^ client.java:5847: <identifier> expected public static int clue[] = {1,2,3,4,5}; ^ client.java:20300: illegal start of type } else { ^ client.java:20525: <identifier> expected public int lnew = 0; ^ NPCHandler.java:680: 'class' or 'interface' expected public static boolean IsDropping = false; ^ NPCHandler.java:681: 'class' or 'interface' expected public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID) ^ NPCHandler.java:972: 'class' or 'interface' expected public static int worldmap2[][] = { ^ NPCHandler.java:981: 'class' or 'interface' expected public int remove = 2; // 1 = removes equipment, 2 = doesn't remove - xerozcheez
^ NPCHandler.java:982: 'class' or 'interface' expected public static int removeschaos[] = {1,2,2,2}; ^ NPCHandler.java:984: 'class' or 'interface' expected public static int randomremoveschaos() ^ NPCHandler.java:1518: 'class' or 'interface' expected } ^ NPCHandler.java:1519: 'class' or 'interface' expected ^ 12 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Help plx? coders plz help
item.dc:creator: @coder_no0b coder no0b
item.description:
@coder_no0b wrote:

justin, im sending the files now…and i know how to make admin…i mean if u help me u get my awesome client and ul be adfmi nat my server

Read full topic

item.title: Help plx? coders plz help
item.dc:creator: @justin4143 justin4143
item.description:
@justin4143 wrote:

o yeah and if u wana be admin

Go into the characters file look for ur name. Double click on it and ull see difrent stuff.

Look for PlayerRights = 0

Chage it to PlayerRgihts = 3

Then type in ::master

That should work.

Read full topic

item.title: Help plx? coders plz help
item.dc:creator: @justin4143 justin4143
item.description:
@justin4143 wrote:

Ok ill add full specs to ur server. Email me at QUADRUNNERFIVE00@aim.com and ill add when i get home from school.

I just need ur client.java and ur GraphicsHandler.java. Then when im done ill send back. The most time it takes is 15 min.

-Justin4143

Read full topic
